𒅤 bù = PÙ le'P' lip / mouth ⇔ 𓂋 pea (vs Erbse)

𒌋𒌋 Puzur in 𒌋𒌋𒀭𒈹𒂞 Puzur Šušinak
𒅤𒊭 Puzur in 𒅤𒊭 𒀭𒈹𒂞 Puzur Šušinak <> 𒉺𒋼𒋛𒃻 PA.TE.SI Ensi 𜑹𜎄𜏳 𜎏𜑰𜎂𜐳 𒅤𒊭 PÙ.šaʳ Basileo / Shar / Zar 𒊭 𓇓

π form 𒈬 •pumu pheme fame eme 𒅴 ⇔ 𒅤 PÙ:mouth

𒄥𒁾𒅤 gur-dup-pum •Korb:δάρπη dárpē
